scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Laura
scrape.text: The set-up didn’t work for me - the courses of a meal meant to reveal parts of the backstory that correspond with the significance of the meal itself. Also the set-up of the story itself - mental illness equals right wing fascist views. There was a little bit of interest in the narrator’s voice though that kept me from hating the book as well as some of the social commentary. Can’t say I recommend.
